mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT u.id AS user_info_id, u.user_name, u.engineer_type, u.image, u.description, t.skill, (SELECT count(follow_user_info_id) from follow where user_info_id = u.id) AS follow_count, (SELECT count(user_info_id) from follow where follow_user_info_id = u.id) AS follower_count, (SELECT count(id) from articles where user_info_id = u.id) AS article_count FROM user_info AS u LEFT JOIN user_info_tags AS ut ON ut.user_info_id = u.id LEFT JOIN tags AS t ON t.id = ut.tag_id WHERE u.id = #{userInfoId};
